content.rendered:
This list contains information about songs about the moon, ranked by user votes. The moon is mysterious and its powers have often been explored through lunar lyrics in great songs. The best songs about the moon range from directly referencing the moon in the night sky to enjoying the best that moonlight has to offer. Some songs about the moon are even about werewolves, like Ozzy Osbourne’s Bark at the Moon.

Pink Floyd’s “Brain Damage/Eclipse features soaring vocals and the lyrics, I’ll see you on the dark side of the moon.” Moonlight Drive by The Doors is also one of the great songs you will find on this list of the top moon songs, as is Moonlight Mile by the Rolling Stones. The Beatles paid tribute to the moon with their catchy tune, “Mr. Moonlight.”

Several songs about the moon make you want to get up and dance. Van Morrison’s Moondance and Dancing in the Moonlight by King Harvest are two examples of upbeat moon songs.

Which good moon song on this list is your all-time favorite? Vote it to the top and share your opinions in the comments section.
